What is the significance of this aspect? This aspect highlights the callous and profit-driven approach of the HM Passport Office towards affected families during the passport fiasco. 

What inferences can be made about the overall situation? This aspect confirms the belief that the government could have done more to mitigate the impact of the passport fiasco on affected families and instead, used the situation to generate revenue.
